com.wit.android.widget.adapter

Interface AdapterOptimizer.OptimizedAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseAdapter, BaseMultiAdapter, SimpleCursorAdapter, SimpleCursorMultiAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    AdapterOptimizer

    public static interface AdapterOptimizer.OptimizedAdapter

    Class Overview

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      See BaseAdapter.getItemViewType(int).

    • Method Detail

      • onCreateItemView

        android.view.View onCreateItemView(int position,
                                 android.view.LayoutInflater inflater,
                                 android.view.ViewGroup parent)

        Invoked to create a view for the item from this optimized adapter's data set at the specified position. This is invoked only if the convertView for Adapter.getView(int, android.view.View, android.view.ViewGroup) is NULL. You can use the given inflater to inflate requested view or you can create it manually.

        Parameters:
        position - The position of the item from this optimized adapter's data set.
        inflater - Layout inflater provided by getLayoutInflater().
        parent - The parent view, to that will be this view eventually assigned to.
        Returns:
        Created item view.

      • onSetUpItemView

        void onSetUpItemView(int position,
                   java.lang.Object viewHolder)

        Invoked to set up and populate a view for an item from this optimized adapter's data set at the specified position. This is invoked whenever Adapter.getView(int, android.view.View, android.view.ViewGroup) on this adapter is called.

        Parameters:
        position - The position of item within this optimized adapter's data set.
        viewHolder - Same type of holder as provided by onCreateItemViewHolder(int, android.view.View) for the specified position.

      • onCreateItemViewHolder

        java.lang.Object onCreateItemViewHolder(int position,
                                      android.view.View itemView)

        Invoked to obtain view holder for the actually created item view.

        Parameters:
        position - The position of the item from this optimized adapter's data set.
        itemView - Same type of view as provided by onCreateItemView(int, android.view.LayoutInflater, android.view.ViewGroup) at the specified position.
        Returns:
        Created holder for the given itemView.

      • getLayoutInflater

        android.view.LayoutInflater getLayoutInflater()

        Returns layout inflater for the current context.

        Returns:
        Layout inflater.

      • getItemViewType

        int getItemViewType(int position)

        See BaseAdapter.getItemViewType(int).
